text: (; born 6 January 1981) is a Belgian actor. He acted in Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001) and the 2012 movie My Way. He played Pierre Bergé in the 2014 biopic Saint Laurent. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:Belgian voice actors Category:Belgian stage actors Category:Actors from Brussels
title: Jérémie Renier
